name: Sprouts Discord Bot
description: Enterprise-grade Discord bot with ticket system, feature flags, embed builder, and deployment protection

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'SPROUTS Bot deployed successfully on Digital Ocean'

BOT_OWNER_ID.description: Discord user ID of the bot owner

LOG_COMMANDS_CHANNEL.description: Discord channel ID for command logging (default: none)

LOG_DMS_CHANNEL.description: Discord channel ID for DM logging (default: none)

LOG_GUILD_EVENTS.description: Discord channel ID for guild event logging (default: none)

DATABASE_URL.description: PostgreSQL connection string for enterprise data storage
